value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|♪Hmm-hmm-hm-mmm-mm...
Your spirit shall shine...♪$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Er... Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|♪Across the generations!
Now, and for all time!♪$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|C-Commander Anna?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Right, then! We're ready for our next
mission at the dance festival. Let's
not waste any time—time to head out!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|Rinea... Where are you?! Could it be
that she has not yet arrived?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Dance19,Face|The ladies are currently choosing
their accessories, it would seem...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|Still?! At this rate the festival will
have ended by the time the dancing
finally begins...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Dance19,Face|Cast your worries aside. Others
approach as we speak...$k$pThough it seems their presence will
demand from us a different kind of
dance... Let's begin.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|...Ugh! Where did I make my misstep?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Dance19,Face|Fret not. We will retreat for now
and rendezvous with the ladies.$k$p$Sbs150|
